'''Caramella Chubb''' was one of the recipients of [[Bilbo]]'s gifts (a clock, due to her lack of punctuality) during his birthday party, in the drafts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{RS|1Ii}}, p. 15</ref> Her name was initially ''Caramella Took'', before she ultimately became a [[Chubb]].<ref>{{RS|1Iiv}}, p. 38</ref>
